subject: Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: A New York judge scheduled a hearing April 2 to settle the date for the America’s Cup showdown between the defending champion Alinghi of Switzerland and the American challenger BMW Oracle Racing. Alinghi wants to race after May 1, 2009, and BMW Oracle Racing is sticking to this October for the head-to-head duel.
